definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Today, 5 percent of Peace Corps volunteers work in youth development.
sentences.chinese: 今天，和平隊有5%的志願者從事青年發展工作。

sentences.english: like maybe the Peace Corps or Jesuit Volunteer Corps.
sentences.chinese: 像和平隊或耶穌會志願者之類的。

sentences.english: Peace Corps volunteers left Sierra Leone in nineteen ninety-four because of civil war.
sentences.chinese: 和平隊志願者1994年由於內戰離開了塞拉利昂。

sentences.english: Kennedy Organization alliance for progress in Latin America and the Peace Corps.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪組織拉丁美洲爭取進步同盟與和平隊。

sentences.english: Today, Gordy Mengel is a Peace Corps programming and training officer in Rwanda.
sentences.chinese: 現在，孟格爾是盧旺達和平隊的一名計劃及訓練主管。

sentences.english: The agency has adapted to a rapidly changing world, Tschetter said.
sentences.chinese: 切特說，和平隊也隨着迅速變化的世界進行了調整。

sentences.english: As a young man, Chris joined the Peace Corps, and taught English in Morocco.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯年輕時參加了和平隊，在摩洛哥教英語。
